tiles.name: User Sessions Query
tiles.query: SELECT FUNNEL((useraction.targetUrl like "%spring_sale%") AS "Spring Sale", (useraction.name="/easytravel/rest/validate-creditcard") AS "Purchase") FROM usersession where useraction.application="www.angular.easytravel.com"

tiles.name: User Sessions Query
tiles.query: SELECT FUNNEL((useraction.targetUrl like "%special_offers%") AS "Special Offers", (useraction.name="/easytravel/rest/validate-creditcard") AS "Purchase") FROM usersession where useraction.application="www.angular.easytravel.com"

tiles.name: User Sessions Query
tiles.query: SELECT continent as "Continent", SUM(doubleProperties.revenue) as "Total Booking $$$" FROM usersession where (stringProperties.web_utm_campaign = "spring_sale") and (useraction.name="/easytravel/rest/validate-creditcard") and useraction.application="www.angular.easytravel.com" GROUP BY continent ORDER BY sum(doubleProperties.revenue) DESC

tiles.name: User Sessions Query
tiles.query: SELECT continent as "Continent", SUM(doubleProperties.revenue) as "Total Booking $$$" FROM usersession where (stringProperties.web_utm_campaign = "special_offers") and (useraction.name="/easytravel/rest/validate-creditcard") and useraction.application="www.angular.easytravel.com" GROUP BY continent ORDER BY sum(doubleProperties.revenue) DESC

tiles.name: User Sessions Query
tiles.query: SELECT SUM(errorCount) as "Total" FROM useraction where (targetUrl like "%spring_sale%") and useraction.application="www.angular.easytravel.com"

tiles.name: User Sessions Query
tiles.query: SELECT SUM(errorCount) as "Total" FROM useraction where (targetUrl like "%special_offers%") and useraction.application="www.angular.easytravel.com"

tiles.name: User Sessions Query
tiles.query: SELECT AVG(useraction.visuallyCompleteTime) as "Average" FROM useraction where (targetUrl like "%spring_sale%") and useraction.application="www.angular.easytravel.com"

tiles.name: User Sessions Query
tiles.query: SELECT AVG(doubleProperties.revenue) as "$$$" FROM usersession where (stringProperties.web_utm_campaign = "spring_sale") and (useraction.name="/easytravel/rest/validate-creditcard") and useraction.application="www.angular.easytravel.com"

tiles.name: User Sessions Query
tiles.query: SELECT Count(*) as "Total" FROM useraction where (targetUrl like "%spring_sale%") and useraction.application="www.angular.easytravel.com"

tiles.name: User Sessions Query
tiles.query: SELECT Count(*) as "Total" FROM useraction where (targetUrl like "%special_offers%") and useraction.application="www.angular.easytravel.com"

tiles.name: User Sessions Query
tiles.query: SELECT AVG(useraction.visuallyCompleteTime) as "Average" FROM useraction where (targetUrl like "%special_offers%") and useraction.application="www.angular.easytravel.com"

tiles.name: User Sessions Query
tiles.query: SELECT stringProperties.web_utm_source as "Source", stringProperties.web_utm_medium as "Medium",  SUM(doubleProperties.revenue) as "Total Booking $$$" FROM usersession where (stringProperties.web_utm_campaign = "spring_sale") and (useraction.name="/easytravel/rest/validate-creditcard") and useraction.application="www.angular.easytravel.com" GROUP BY stringProperties.web_utm_source, stringProperties.web_utm_medium ORDER BY sum(doubleProperties.revenue) DESC

tiles.name: User Sessions Query
tiles.query: SELECT stringProperties.web_utm_source as "Source", stringProperties.web_utm_medium as "Medium",  SUM(doubleProperties.revenue) as "Total Booking $$$" FROM usersession where (stringProperties.web_utm_campaign = "special_offers") and (useraction.name="/easytravel/rest/validate-creditcard") and useraction.application="www.angular.easytravel.com" GROUP BY stringProperties.web_utm_source, stringProperties.web_utm_medium ORDER BY sum(doubleProperties.revenue) DESC

tiles.name: User Sessions Query
tiles.query: SELECT SUM(doubleProperties.revenue) as "$$$" FROM usersession where (stringProperties.web_utm_campaign = "spring_sale") and (useraction.name="/easytravel/rest/validate-creditcard") and useraction.application="www.angular.easytravel.com"

tiles.name: User Sessions Query
tiles.query: SELECT SUM(doubleProperties.revenue) as "$$$" FROM usersession where (stringProperties.web_utm_campaign ="special_offers") and (useraction.name="/easytravel/rest/validate-creditcard") and useraction.application="www.angular.easytravel.com"

tiles.name: User Sessions Query
tiles.query: SELECT AVG(doubleProperties.revenue) as "$$$" FROM usersession where (stringProperties.web_utm_campaign="special_offers") and (useraction.name="/easytravel/rest/validate-creditcard") and useraction.application="www.angular.easytravel.com"

tiles.name: User Sessions Query
tiles.customName: Booking Total by Continent, Country, Region & City
tiles.query: SELECT Continent, Country, Region, City, SUM(doubleProperties.revenue) as "Total Booking $$$" FROM usersession where (stringProperties.web_utm_campaign = "spring_sale") and (useraction.name="/easytravel/rest/validate-creditcard") and useraction.application="www.angular.easytravel.com" and city IS NOT NULL GROUP BY Continent, Country, Region, City ORDER BY sum(doubleProperties.revenue) DESC Limit 10

tiles.name: User Sessions Query
tiles.customName: Booking Total by Continent, Country, Region & City
tiles.query: SELECT Continent, Country, Region, City, SUM(doubleProperties.revenue) as "Total Booking $$$" FROM usersession where (stringProperties.web_utm_campaign = "special_offers") and (useraction.name="/easytravel/rest/validate-creditcard") and useraction.application="www.angular.easytravel.com" and city IS NOT NULL GROUP BY Continent, Country, Region, City ORDER BY sum(doubleProperties.revenue) DESC Limit 10
